conversation.line: Good morning, Viorel. I've been thinking about the fantasy-based institutions of power, such as wizards' guilds and kingdoms.
Oh, Pelu, always so serious! You're amusing me with your thoughts on these fantasy-based institutions.

I apologize if I seem amusing to you, Viorel. But the way these institutions wield magical power and control over the land and its inhabitants is quite serious. I have been warning about one institution growing too much.
I understand that, Pelu. But you always have a way of making even the most serious of subjects amusing. So, tell me more about your warning.

Well, it's important for individuals to be aware of the actions and policies of these institutions and to hold them accountable for their use of magical power. The rising power of one institution over others can lead to imbalance and chaos in the land.

Indeed, it's crucial for the citizens to be aware of the power dynamics and keep a check on the institutions so that they don't abuse their power and create chaos in the land. We must stay vigilant and not let any one institution grow too much.
